Initialize a variable to track the maximum diameter. We'll use an array to pass by reference.
Create a helper function that calculates height and updates the maximum diameter.
In the helper function, handle the base case: if node is null, return 0.
Recursively calculate left and right heights.
Update the maximum diameter: diameter through this node = leftHeight + rightHeight.
Return the height of the current node: 1 + max(leftHeight, rightHeight).
Call the helper function and return the maximum diameter.
